data.name: RPG Maker MV - HammerStrike Pixel Art Animations
data.detailed_description:
Need some retro-style animations reminiscent of the golden era of gaming? Look no farther than HammerStrike Pixel Art Animations.

Brought to you by HammerStrike, a new, creative and fun pack of retro style interesting animations featuring hypnotic discs, pulsars, letters and numbers, slashes, whirling discs, wave attacks, interesting mathematical designed shapes, and more!

Features:

Over 70 animations for RPG Maker MV.
Includes weapons, letters, number icons.
Includes Bite, Slash, Wave attack as well as Tsunami, Nuke, Explosion, Impact animations.
Includes fun animations such as Hypnosis and Music rings.
Works well with other pixel art pack like Time Fantasy and Nostalgia Graphics Pack.

data.short_description: Need some retro-style animations reminiscent of the golden era of gaming? Look no farther than HammerStrike Pixel Art Animations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
